channel.title: Saving char files
channel.description:
hello, i was gonna use project 16v6 from the downloads section as my base but when i logon it saves the char files the FIRST time i log out. then affterwards it wont save. can someone tell me how to fix this?
or a link for a working pimpscape.
help would be greatly apreciated

item.title: Saving char files
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

[quote=“joeyjuggalo, post:1, topic:144044”]hello, i was gonna use project 16v6 from the downloads section as my base but when i logon it saves the char files the FIRST time i log out. then affterwards it wont save. can someone tell me how to fix this?

or a link for a working pimpscape.

help would be greatly apreciated[/quote]
Add the save command to the logout case.

Read full topic
